organisation_name: European Factories of the Future Research Association (EFFRA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The European Factories of the Future Research Association (EFFRA) is an industry-driven association promoting the development of new and innovative production technologies. It is the official representative of the private side in the European Union's  'Factories of the Future' public-private partnership.
